title: Will Soudal Quick-Step Make Room for Tim Merlier at the 2025 Tour de France?
content:
If he gets another Tour snub, Belgian sprint king Merlier could be on the rider market when his current contract ends in 2025.

Read the full article at Will Soudal Quick-Step Make Room for Tim Merlier at the 2025 Tour de France? on Velo.
author: ahood
